text: <@U22PKFRU5> <@UD53A9UUR> I created a smart module based on email campaign, but it does not seem to work! Whatâ€™s the best way to troubleshoot/ask for help about this?

To echo what <@UD53A9UUR> said - 2019 we're doubling down on local development. The team is already exploring how to improve the experience.

I know the experience is a bit "figure it out as you go" right now... thanks for you patience. We're working our butts off to improve it for you :slightly_smiling_face:
You could try reposting in <#CBZK16L9L|ftp-feedback> to see if anyone happens to have any other additional feedback.

Hi Dennis, this is not actively supported today (we're working on it) but is possible if you use Local HubL Server + FTP and pull down the JSON that way.  It's definitely not for the faint of heart :disappointed:
